Overview

- Release date: 2018, February
- Known as BQ Aquaris VS Plus
- Android 7.1.2 (Nougat) upgradeable to 8 (Oreo)
- Size of 152.3 x 76.7 x 8.4 mm
- 183 grams

Display

- 5.5" FullHD resolution (1920 x 1080)
- IPS LCD
- Screen-to-body ratio: ~68.9%
- 401 ppi density
- Dinorex Glass

Memory

- 64 GB mass storage
- Expandable with microSD up to 256 GB
- 4 GB RAM

Battery

- Non-removable 3400 mAh battery
- (?) hours talk time (3G)

Sensors

✔ Gyroscope
✔ Accelerometer
✔ Proximity
✔ Compass
✘ Barometer

Processor

- Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 (8 Cortex-A53 up to 1.4 GHz)
- GPU: Adreno 505

Cameras

- 12 MP (f/2) main
- 8 MP (f/2) front

✘ Image Stabilizer
✔ Main LED flash
✔ Front LED flash

Sound

- Loudspeaker(s): Mono
- Microphone(s): Stereo

Connectivity

- Supports LTE-A up to 300 Mbps
- Bluetooth 4.2
- Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n/ac

✔ Headphone jack
✘ Type-C USB
✔ OTG USB
✔ FM Radio
✔ NFC
✘ eSIM

· 2G networks
850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
· 3G networks
850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100

Additional features

- Dual SIM version
- Fast battery charging
- Fingerprint reader

- 5 MP (f/2.4) front ✔ LED flash

- Supports LTE up to 150 Mbps
- Bluetooth 4.2
- Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n
